title: Looking for a top lane nasus main (or competent split pusher)
body: Hello I'm  a jungle/top main looking for a top/? main who's primary strategy is to split push. I love split pushing and winning games by taking objectives and pressuring the map instead of 5v5 tdms. I main udyr/jax in the jg and nasus in the top lane. Currently Gold2, although I was plat 1 last season. I am a casual player usually on after 5pm EST for a couple of hours. message me in game if interested. PillClinton805

replies.body: Used to play split push a lot but my team almost always engage 4v5 somehow when I was almost at their inhib turrets, and when 4 man is trying to catch me and my team just farm their jg up instead of dragon/baroning.... I feel like it only works with a good lead or smart teammates...
Sure I'm down.  Add me in game PillClinton805

Hey i added you. I was silver 4 last season i'm currently in bronze 4. Split pushing is my favorite tactic and i'd love to play with a jungler who understands how to play around that.  I play top lane{{champion:77}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:245}} who all have solid wave clear and can really handle themselves in a 2v1 situation. If you wanna play some norms sometime just let me know.
